parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the IDs of all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ* format. The time must be in UTC.

> The end time must be later than the start time. The maximum time range that can be specified is seven days.

parameters.name: ExecuteCost
parameters.description: The execution duration of the SQL statement. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: ExecuteState
parameters.description:
The execution status of the SQL statement. Valid values:

*   **1**: successful.
*   **0**: failed.

parameters.name: MaxExecuteCost
parameters.description: The maximum amount of time consumed by a slow query. Unit: seconds. Minimum value: 0.

parameters.name: MinExecuteCost
parameters.description: The minimum amount of time consumed by a slow query. Unit: seconds. Minimum value: 0.

parameters.name: OperationClass
parameters.description:
The type of the query language. Valid values:

*   **DQL**
*   **DML**
*   **DDL**
*   **DCL**
*   **TCL**

parameters.name: OperationType
parameters.description:
The type of the SQL statement.

> 

*   If **OperationClass** is specified, the value of **OperationType** must belong to the corresponding query language. For example, if **OperationClass** is set to **DQL**, the value of **OperationType** must be a **DQL** statement such as **SELECT**.

*   If **OperationClass** is not specified, the value of **OperationType** can be an SQL statement of any query language.
*   If **OperationClass** and **OperationType** are not specified, all types of SQL statements are returned.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Valid values:

*   **30**
*   **50**
*   **100**

Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: QueryKeywords
parameters.description: The keywords of the SQL statement.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ* format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: User
parameters.description: The name of the database account.
